content: **crochet blanket in 2 strands of alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 250 g colour no 0100 off-white **pattern links ** finnish version 1 french version 2 also available at https //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2208&cid=17 1 http //garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=20&lang=fi 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=20
